@frontline_india @capt_amarinder @PunjabLokCong @ziyaussalam No wonder Capt. All my letters to you were ignored as you were busy making money ! @DrAvneetR . Where do we go with that money in life? The paths of glory leads but to the grave. #PunjabElections #UPElections2022 #JoeMillionaire #GildedAge #PostOfficeScandal #PunjabElections2022

Paths of Glory (1957)…

Verse 3

He restoreth my soul: He leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

Mush:
During times of rest as well as times of stress/struggle, He shares His strength as He gives me opportunities to shine the light on His glory.

/3

Just watched Paths of Glory, A film worthy of my vast intelligence. 3/5
Just watched Paths of Glory, I deserve better 2/5
Just watched Paths of Glory, Cringe. 1/5
RT @MJMcKean: Very believable as an insufferable prick in Paths of Glory--his personal politics aside, of course.
RT @MJMcKean: Very believable as an insufferable prick in Paths of Glory--his personal politics aside, of course.
@pbvdc @hellobooze This is not true at all. Anti-war movies have been around since war movies themselves. See All Quiet on the Western Front, Paths of Glory, or hell, even Apocalypse Now.
@ClassicMovieHub The detestable General Broulard in Paths Of Glory
@vizwatcher I’ve been wanting to watch Paths of Glory but Blow Out is great. Shampoo, for me at least, isn’t worth it
@freddie_lombard @BritishGQ Kubrick had already had a few major works under his belt (that included Paths of Glory and Dr. Strangelove) before he did 2001.
